description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Endless Swarm is a game where you build and control towers to defend two factories from waves of enemy onslaughts.  It features 8 unique towers, 7 different enemy types, 2 player cooperative multiplayer, 3 powerful superpowers, and endless challenge.  See how long you can survive the Endless Swarm and beat your high scores!
